title: Corners
description: A full size 1v1 with artillery, infantry, and cavalry.

title: Basic Battle
description: A 2v2 or free for all with infantry and cavalry.

title: Hallway
description: A close quarters 2v2 battle with infantry and cavalry.

title: Cross
description: A hectic 2v2 or free for all with all unit types.

title: Skirmish
description: Four walled in armies of infantry and cavalry shall fight to the end.

title: Chaos
description: The battle has been left in disarray, which scattered army will prevail?
